summary: Tested Adaptive Performance Coach (Focus Page v2). All 12 backend tests passed. Frontend renders all 4 sections correctly with working interactive features.

verified: Returns 200 with 4 sections: diagnosis, next_game_plan, plan_audit, skill_signals
diagnosis contains primary_leak with id, label, explanation, example_position (with FEN)
next_game_plan contains domains array with id, label, goal, intensity
plan_audit contains audit_cards with status (executed/partial/missed) and board_link_fen
skill_signals contains signals with trend (improving/declining/stable), trend_arrow, reason
Rating band correctly detected based on user rating (1200 -> 1000-1600)
Returns 200 for valid game_id
Returns error message for invalid game_id
Focus page loads at /focus with title 'Focus' and rating band info
Coach Diagnosis section (data-testid='coach-diagnosis') shows primary leak 'Tactical Awareness'
Next Game Plan section (data-testid='next-game-plan') shows 3 domain cards
Plan Audit section (data-testid='plan-audit') shows audit cards with status icons
Skill Signals section (data-testid='skill-signals') shows 5 signals with trend arrows
Button (data-testid='view-leak-pattern') is present in Coach Diagnosis
Clicking button loads position on board
Board title updates to 'Typical Tactical Awareness Pattern'
Missed audit cards have Eye icons for viewing positions
Clicking Eye icon loads board position with correct FEN
Board title updates (e.g., 'Middlegame Objective - Move 7')
Signals with example_position have Eye icons (Tactical Awareness, Advantage Discipline)
Clicking Eye icon loads example position on board
Trend arrows: green ↑ for improving, red ↓ for declining, yellow → for stable
Opening Stability: declining
Tactical Awareness: improving
Advantage Discipline: declining
Endgame Technique: stable
Time Control: stable
